content: {"message": "Hello Samuel, this is Donna calling from Arionkoder. I'm reaching out to you today because we need to confirm your last name for our records. Could you please provide that information?", "continue_chat": true}

{"message": "Thank you for confirming that, Samuel. I have updated our records with your last name as Baptista. If there's nothing else you need, I wish you a great day. Goodbye!", "continue_chat": false}
